PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-16822017-12-15,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActNuclear Liability and Compensation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Nuclear Liability and Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NUCLEAR LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to update the Regulations to reflect the anticipated decommissioning of the University of Alberta SLOWPOKE 2 Reactor Site and the corrected description of the Bruce Nuclear Generating Stations A and B site.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0285 Publication Date: 2018-01-10
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Nuclear Liability and Compensation Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the NUCLEAR LIABILITY AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to update the Regulations to reflect the anticipated decommissioning of the University of Alberta SLOWPOKE 2 Reactor Site and the corrected description of the Bruce Nuclear Generating Stations A and B site.
